subsection_content: Bacterial urethritis can usually be treated with medication. However, when the disease is not treated promptly and properly, the patient can face serious complications such as urethral stricture, infection spreading to other areas of the urinary tract such as the bladder and kidneys. . Some genital tract complications such as epididymal orchitis... can lead to infertility.
subsection_title: viem nieu dao.json. Complications of urethritis
subsection_data:
viem nieu dao.json. Complications of urethritis
Bacterial urethritis can usually be treated with medication. However, when the disease is not treated promptly and properly, the patient can face serious complications such as urethral stricture, infection spreading to other areas of the urinary tract such as the bladder and kidneys. . Some genital tract complications such as epididymal orchitis... can lead to infertility.
